segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!

segments.content: This week I'm excited about a promising new headless component library, and I've found various interesting articles about Web Components relevant to React developers.
segments.sourceMdx: This week I'm excited about a promising new headless component library, and I've found various interesting articles about Web Components relevant to React developers.
segments.translated_content: 本周我为一款前景广阔的无头组件库感到兴奋，并发现了多篇与React开发者相关的Web Components有趣文章。

segments.content: On the mobile side, Google introduced Android XR and React Native support is already coming!
segments.sourceMdx: On the mobile side, Google introduced Android XR and React Native support is already coming!
segments.translated_content: 在移动端方面，谷歌推出了Android XR，而React Native的支持已在路上！

segments.content:
🎄 We are taking a Christmas break, this is the last newsletter until 8th January.\
🧑‍🎄 You've already given me a great gift, we are now 4th most popular JS newsletter according to the recently published [State of JS 2024 survey result](https://2024.stateofjs.com/en-US/resources/).
segments.sourceMdx:
🎄 We are taking a Christmas break, this is the last newsletter until 8th January.\

segments.translated_content:
🎄 我们将迎来圣诞假期，这是1月8日前的最后一期简报。\
🧑‍🎄 你们已经送给我一份大礼——根据最新发布的[2024年JavaScript现状调查报告](https://2024.stateofjs.com/en-US/resources/)，我们已成为第四大受欢迎的JS简报。

segments.content: [Product for Engineers](https://dub.link/twir-dec18) is PostHog’s newsletter dedicated to helping engineers improve their product skills.

segments.content: With over 30k subscribers, it is a trusted source that bridges the gap between product and engineering, helping you ship products users love.
segments.sourceMdx: With over 30k subscribers, it is a trusted source that bridges the gap between product and engineering, helping you ship products users love.
segments.translated_content: 拥有超过3万订阅者，这份简报弥合了产品与工程之间的鸿沟，助你打造用户喜爱的产品。

segments.content: It covers topics like how to choose the right technologies, non-obvious behaviors that will kill your startup, and A/B testing mistakes they learned the hard way. It’s totally free and always will be.
segments.sourceMdx: It covers topics like how to choose the right technologies, non-obvious behaviors that will kill your startup, and A/B testing mistakes they learned the hard way. It’s totally free and always will be.
segments.translated_content: 内容涵盖技术选型、可能扼杀初创公司的非显性行为，以及他们用教训换来的A/B测试经验。完全免费且永久免费。

segments.content: ## ⚛️ React
segments.sourceMdx: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

segments.content: [![Base UI 1.0 alpha](/emails/issues/214/base-ui.jpg)](https://base-ui.com/)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Base UI 1.0 alpha](/emails/issues/214/base-ui.jpg)](https://base-ui.com/)

segments.content: [**Base UI 1.0 alpha**](https://base-ui.com/)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Base UI 1.0 alpha**](https://base-ui.com/)

segments.content: I’m usually not into UI libs. But when Radix, MUI and Floating UI creators gather to create a new set of 25 unstyled, accessible, composable primitive components with great care to details, I think it’s worth paying attention! Radix is super popular these days (notably thanks to shadcn/ui), but has been [less actively maintained](https://github.com/radix-ui/primitives/graphs/contributors) recently, and a new headless lib challenger is always welcome!
segments.sourceMdx: I’m usually not into UI libs. But when Radix, MUI and Floating UI creators gather to create a new set of 25 unstyled, accessible, composable primitive components with great care to details, I think it’s worth paying attention\! Radix is super popular these days (notably thanks to shadcn/ui), but has been [less actively maintained](https://github.com/radix-ui/primitives/graphs/contributors) recently, and a new headless lib challenger is always welcome\!
segments.translated_content: 我通常对UI库不太感冒。但当Radix、MUI和Floating UI的创作者们联手打造这套包含25个无样式、可访问、可组合的原子组件，并在细节上精益求精时，我认为值得关注！Radix目前非常流行（尤其得益于shadcn/ui），但近期[维护活跃度有所下降](https://github.com/radix-ui/primitives/graphs/contributors)，此时出现新的无头组件库挑战者总是令人期待！

segments.content: **React 19 and Custom Elements**
segments.sourceMdx: **React 19 and Custom Elements**

segments.content: Various related articles I found interesting:
segments.sourceMdx: Various related articles I found interesting:

segments.content:
* 📜 [React 19 and Web Component Examples](https://frontendmasters.com/blog/react-19-and-web-component-examples/): Chris Coyier testing React 19 custom elements support by creating a Lit element and rendering it though JSX. You can seamlessly pass an object as props, but for event handlers you may need to dispatch a custom event.
* 📜 [React 19 introduces full support for custom elements](https://aleks-elkin.github.io/posts/2024-12-06-react-19/): Comparing support improvement between React 18 and React 19.
* 📜 [Sweet Suspense](https://plainvanillaweb.com/blog/articles/2024-09-09-sweet-suspense/): Fun experiment recreating React lazy/Suspense/ErrorBoundary with custom elements.
* 📜 [Isomorphic Web Components](https://jakelazaroff.com/words/isomorphic-web-components/): Not using React, but a useful overview of server-side rendering support for Web components.
segments.sourceMdx:
- 📜 [React 19 and Web Component Examples](https://frontendmasters.com/blog/react-19-and-web-component-examples/): Chris Coyier testing React 19 custom elements support by creating a Lit element and rendering it though JSX. You can seamlessly pass an object as props, but for event handlers you may need to dispatch a custom event.
- 📜 [React 19 introduces full support for custom elements](https://aleks-elkin.github.io/posts/2024-12-06-react-19/): Comparing support improvement between React 18 and React 19\.
- 📜 [Sweet Suspense](https://plainvanillaweb.com/blog/articles/2024-09-09-sweet-suspense/): Fun experiment recreating React lazy/Suspense/ErrorBoundary with custom elements.
- 📜 [Isomorphic Web Components](https://jakelazaroff.com/words/isomorphic-web-components/): Not using React, but a useful overview of server-side rendering support for Web components.
segments.translated_content:
- 📜 [React 19与Web组件示例](https://frontendmasters.com/blog/react-19-and-web-component-examples/)：Chris Coyier通过创建Lit元素并用JSX渲染来测试React 19对自定义元素的支持。可以无缝传递对象作为props，但事件处理可能需要派发自定义事件。
- 📜 [React 19全面支持自定义元素](https://aleks-elkin.github.io/posts/2024-12-06-react-19/)：对比React 18与19的支持改进。
- 📜 [甜蜜的Suspense](https://plainvanillaweb.com/blog/articles/2024-09-09-sweet-suspense/)：用自定义元素复现React的lazy/Suspense/ErrorBoundary的有趣实验。
- 📜 [同构Web组件](https://jakelazaroff.com/words/isomorphic-web-components/)：虽未使用React，但对Web组件服务端渲染支持的概述很有价值。

segments.content:
* 💸 [React Bricks – the Visual CMS for React got more accessible with lower entry price and flexible pay-as-you-go options. Start for free!](https://www.reactbricks.com/?utm_source=twir\&utm_campaign=ql24)
* 🐦 [Lee Robinson explains why transitioning between pages when running Next.js locally take time](https://x.com/leeerob/status/1869095675201192335)
* 👀 [Next.js PR - `unstable_rootParams()`](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/72837): A new convenient experimental API to return path params from all path segments up to the root layout. Looks particularly useful for accessing a i18n `[locale]` param.
* 👀 [Next.js PR - `experimental.newDevOverlay`](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/73977): A new dev overlay is coming and the feature flag already exists.
* 👀 [Rsbuild PR - plugin-react-router](https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rsbuild/pull/4186): React Router framework features (Remix) are now implemented as a Vite plugin, but it seems other bundlers could also turn React Router into a framework 😲
* 🎄 [GitHub Unwrapped 2024](https://githubunwrapped.com/): The Remotion-based project has just been update for 2024.
* 📜 [How to validate your React i18next application](https://lingual.dev/blog/how-to-validate-your-react-i18next-application/): Present a workflow based on react-i18next to prevent missing, unused, and invalid translation keys. There’s another post for react-intl users.
* 📜 [Rails + Stimulus + React - The definitive way to integrate](https://blog.codeminer42.com/rails-stimulus-react/): Using Stimulus data attributes to mount a React autocomplete component on a Rails page.
* 📜 [Build-time Open Graph Images in Remix](https://kettanaito.com/blog/build-time-og-images-in-remix): Explains limits of Satori, and introduces a new remix-og-image Vite plugin that spawns a Chromium instance.
* 📜 [5 tips to effectively optimize INP in React](https://calendar.perfplanet.com/2024/5-tips-to-effectively-optimize-inp-in-react/): Reduce DOM size, split components, use Suspense, avoid hydration errors, pay attention to useEffect that can be synchronous.
* 📜 [You might not need a React Form Library](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-form-validation/): Shows how to validate forms server-side and client-side without a library.
* 📜 [Introducing TanStack Start](https://frontendmasters.com/blog/introducing-tanstack-start/)
* 📜 [React Tech Stack for 2025](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-tech-stack/)
* 📜 [Sharing Types and Code Between the Server and Client](https://echobind.com/post/sharing-types-and-code-between-the-server-and-client)
* 📜 [Storybook tags - Organize your components and stories to match the way you work](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-tags/)
* 📜 [The Mental Model of Server Components](https://saewitz.com/the-mental-model-of-server-components)
* 📜 [How to Dockerize a React App](https://www.docker.com/blog/how-to-dockerize-react-app/)
* 📦 [Inertia 2.0 - Redefining Frontend Development for Laravel](https://blog.laravel.com/announcing-inertia-20-redefining-frontend-development-for-laravel): New major version of this tool that seamlessly integrates React into PHP backends. New features: async requests, deferred props, prefetching, polling.
* 📦 [Apollo Client 3.12 - GraphQL fragment data masking](https://www.apollographql.com/blog/more-resilient-code-with-data-masking-in-apollo-client-3-12): Similar to Relay, Apollo Client improves in colocation, encapsulation, and performance. A component will only receive the fields it needs, and nothing more.
* 📦 [Virtua 0.39 - Zero-config, fast and small virtual list - React 19 support](https://github.com/inokawa/virtua)
* 📦 [Material UI EoY update - MUI v5/6 are compatible with React 19](https://mui.com/blog/material-ui-2024-updates/)
* 📦 [Roadmap UI - Composable components for building interactive roadmaps - Gantt, Kanban, Calendar, List, Table](https://www.roadmap-ui.com/)
* 🎥 [Justin Poli - What happens when you break the rules of React?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NsFD-1HkJNU): Mobx-State-Tree maintainer explains plan to make the reactive library compatible with the React Compiler.
* 🎥 [Wawa Sensei - My Journey Coding a VR/AR Rhythm Game with Three.js & React Three Fiber](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jBh4ftHqC5U)
* 🎥 [Theo - Astro stole my favorite parts of Next (and I'm hyped)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3xqa0SsRbdM)
* 🎥 [Shruti Kapoor - React 19: The Features You Actually Want](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hek-Ux9jha8)

- 📜 [The Mental Model of Server Components](https://saewitz.com/the-mental-model-of-server-components)

New features: async requests, deferred props, prefetching, polling.
- 📦 [Apollo Client 3.12 \- GraphQL fragment data masking](https://www.apollographql.com/blog/more-resilient-code-with-data-masking-in-apollo-client-3-12): Similar to Relay, Apollo Client improves in colocation, encapsulation, and performance. A component will only receive the fields it needs, and nothing more.
- 📦 [Virtua 0.39 \- Zero-config, fast and small virtual list \- React 19 support](https://github.com/inokawa/virtua)
- 📦 [Material UI EoY update - MUI v5/6 are compatible with React 19](https://mui.com/blog/material-ui-2024-updates/)
- 📦 [Roadmap UI \- Composable components for building interactive roadmaps \- Gantt, Kanban, Calendar, List, Table](https://www.roadmap-ui.com/)
- 🎥 [Justin Poli \- What happens when you break the rules of React?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NsFD-1HkJNU): Mobx-State-Tree maintainer explains plan to make the reactive library compatible with the React Compiler.

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [React Bricks - 可视化React CMS现已推出更易入门的低价方案和灵活按需付费选项。免费试用！](https://www.reactbricks.com/?utm_source=twir&utm_campaign=ql24)
- 🐦 [Lee Robinson解释为何本地运行Next.js时页面跳转会耗时](https://x.com/leeerob/status/1869095675201192335)
- 👀 [Next.js PR - `unstable_rootParams()`](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/72837): 新实验性API可返回从根布局到当前路径的所有参数，特别适合获取国际化`[locale]`参数。
- 👀 [Next.js PR - `experimental.newDevOverlay`](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/73977): 新版开发调试层即将到来，功能开关已就绪。
- 👀 [Rsbuild PR - plugin-react-router](https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rsbuild/pull/4186): React Router框架功能(Remix)现以Vite插件形式实现，暗示其他打包器也能将React Router转化为框架😲
- 🎄 [GitHub年度回顾2024](https://githubunwrapped.com/): 这个基于Remotion的项目刚完成2024版更新。
- 📜 [如何验证React i18next应用](https://lingual.dev/blog/how-to-validate-your-react-i18next-application/): 基于react-i18next的工作流，防止翻译键缺失/冗余/无效。另有针对react-intl用户的方案。
- 📜 [Rails + Stimulus + React - 终极集成方案](https://blog.codeminer42.com/rails-stimulus-react/): 使用Stimulus数据属性在Rails页面挂载React自动补全组件。
- 📜 [Remix中实现构建时Open Graph图片生成](https://kettanaito.com/blog/build-time-og-images-in-remix): 分析Satori限制，介绍通过remix-og-image Vite插件启动Chromium实例的新方案。
- 📜 [优化React INP指标的5个技巧](https://calendar.perfplanet.com/2024/5-tips-to-effectively-optimize-inp-in-react/): 控制DOM规模、拆分组件、使用Suspense、避免hydration错误、警惕可能同步执行的useEffect。
- 📜 [你可能不需要React表单库](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-form-validation/): 演示如何不依赖库实现服务端与客户端表单验证。
- 📜 [TanStack Start正式发布](https://frontendmasters.com/blog/introducing-tanstack-start/)
- 📜 [2025年React技术栈展望](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-tech-stack/)
- 📜 [服务端与客户端间的类型与代码共享](https://echobind.com/post/sharing-types-and-code-between-the-server-and-client)
- 📜 [Storybook标签系统 - 按工作流组织组件与故事](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-tags/)
- 📜 [服务端组件的思维模型](https://saewitz.com/the-mental-model-of-server-components)
- 📜 [如何将React应用Docker化](https://www.docker.com/blog/how-to-dockerize-react-app/)
- 📦 [Inertia 2.0 - 为Laravel重新定义前端开发](https://blog.laravel.com/announcing-inertia-20-redefining-frontend-development-for-laravel): 该工具新版本无缝整合React与PHP后端，新增异步请求、延迟属性、预加载、轮询等功能。
- 📦 [Apollo Client 3.12 - GraphQL片段数据掩码](https://www.apollographql.com/blog/more-resilient-code-with-data-masking-in-apollo-client-3-12): 类似Relay的改进，组件仅接收所需字段，提升协同定位、封装与性能。
- 📦 [Virtua 0.39 - 零配置、高性能虚拟列表 - 支持React 19](https://github.com/inokawa/virtua)
- 📦 [Material UI年终更新 - v5/6兼容React 19](https://mui.com/blog/material-ui-2024-updates/)
- 📦 [Roadmap UI - 可组合组件库，支持甘特图/看板/日历/列表/表格等路线图交互](https://www.roadmap-ui.com/)
- 🎥 [Justin Poli - 打破React规则会发生什么？](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NsFD-1HkJNU): Mobx-State-Tree维护者讲解如何使响应式库兼容React编译器。
- 🎥 [Wawa Sensei - 使用Three.js和React Three Fiber开发VR/AR节奏游戏的心路历程](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jBh4ftHqC5U)
- 🎥 [Theo - Astro借鉴了Next.js最棒的特性(我超兴奋)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3xqa0SsRbdM)
- 🎥 [Shruti Kapoor - React 19: 你真正需要的功能](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hek-Ux9jha8)

segments.content: **🔧 By Developers, for Developers:**
segments.sourceMdx: **🔧 By Developers, for Developers:**
segments.translated_content: **🔧 开发者打造，为开发者服务：**

segments.content:
* Fully customizable UI components and hooks.
* Comprehensive documentation and quickstart templates for rapid integration.
segments.sourceMdx:
- Fully customizable UI components and hooks.
- Comprehensive documentation and quickstart templates for rapid integration.
segments.translated_content:
- 完全可定制的UI组件和钩子
- 详尽的文档和快速入门模板助力快速集成

segments.content: **⚡ Blazing-Fast Performance:**
segments.sourceMdx: **⚡ Blazing-Fast Performance:**

segments.content:
* Sub-50ms message delivery.
* Scalable for millions of users with a reliable infrastructure.
segments.sourceMdx:
- Sub-50ms message delivery.
- Scalable for millions of users with a reliable infrastructure.
segments.translated_content:
- 消息送达延迟低于50毫秒
- 可扩展架构支持百万级用户量

segments.content: **✨ Out-of-the-Box Features:**
segments.sourceMdx: **✨ Out-of-the-Box Features:**

segments.content:
* Typing indicators, reactions, and threads.
* Rich media support, including file and image sharing.
segments.sourceMdx:
- Typing indicators, reactions, and threads.
- Rich media support, including file and image sharing.
segments.translated_content:
- 输入状态指示、消息反应和会话线程
- 支持富媒体（文件/图片分享等）

segments.content: 🚀 Build Fast. Scale Effortlessly. [Get Started With Stream](https://getstream.io/try-for-free/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_medium=referral\&utm_content=\&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact).
segments.sourceMdx: 🚀 Build Fast. Scale Effortlessly. [Get Started With Stream](https://getstream.io/try-for-free/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact).

segments.content: ## 📱 React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.content:
* 💸 [Demos - 90+ React Native animations crafted with Reanimated, Gesture Handler, and Skia, by Reactiive](https://reactiive.io/demos?utm_source=thisweekinreact)
* 📊 [State of React Native 2024 - Survey open, answer it!](https://survey.stateofreactnative.com/)
* 🐦 [Evan Bacon’s `npx create-target demo`](https://x.com/Baconbrix/status/1868672438898455023): New CLI to create iOS targets (widgets, share extensions) that live alongside your Expo app and can communicate with it through shared storage.
* 🧵 [Infinite Red - Top 2024 React Native posts](https://x.com/infinite_red/status/1869104889777020951)
* 📣 [Android XR SDK Developer Preview](https://developers.googleblog.com/en/introducing-android-xr-sdk-developer-preview/): Google announced a new Android platform for extended reality headsets. As you can expect from Oskar, React Native support is coming ([demo](https://x.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1868645896239690009))
* 📣 [Expo - Upcoming Apple push notification service certificate change](https://expo.dev/blog/upcoming-apple-push-notification-service-certificate-change): Expo Push Service users do not have to do anything.
* 📜 [Add React Native to the Signal open source app](https://blog.swmansion.com/add-react-native-to-the-signal-open-source-app-part-2-android-803c1b726582): 2-part series (iOS + Android) shows how to integrate brownfield RN into an existing app.
* 📜 [How to Upgrade React Native in a Brownfield Application](https://www.callstack.com/blog/how-to-upgrade-react-native-in-a-brownfield-application)
* 📜 [How we promote social sharing on Marathon with Expo](https://expo.dev/blog/how-we-promote-social-sharing-on-marathon-with-expo)
* 📜 [Building Seamless Navigation in Expo Router: Tabs, Modals, and Stacks](https://medium.com/@coby09/building-seamless-navigation-in-expo-router-tabs-modals-and-stacks-2df1a5522321)
* 📦 [React Native Image Playground](https://github.com/Ucekay/react-native-image-playground): To integrate the brand new iOS 18.2+ Apple Intelligence Image Playground into your app, and generate AI images.
* 📦 [Nitro 0.19 - Swift errors, bi-directional Promises, type-erasure](https://github.com/mrousavy/nitro/releases/tag/v0.19.0)
* 📦 [Nitro Palette 1.0 - Fast color palette extraction from images](https://github.com/Ucekay/nitro-palette/releases/tag/v1.0.0)
* 📦 [React Native Volume Manager 2.0 - New Architecture, 0.76+, iOS 15+, Expo 52+](https://github.com/hirbod/react-native-volume-manager/releases/tag/v2.0.1)
* 📦 [Drag Select 0.1 - Utility for creating a pan gesture that auto-selects items in a list](https://github.com/osamaqarem/drag-select)
* 📦 [React Native Testing Library 13.0 RC - Enables concurrent rendering by default, automatically extends Jest matchers](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-testing-library/releases/tag/v13.0.0-rc.0)
* 🎥 [Dan’s Lab - Basic 3D Graphics with Linear Algebra and React-Native Skia](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uZBGcbKFhXE)
* 🎥 [Expo - Universal Full-Stack Expo Stripe Payment Integration](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0tyxUV_omY)
* 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 56 - Bluesky's React Native App & AT Protocol with Samuel Newman](https://share.transistor.fm/s/2134db4c)
* 🎙️ [React Universe On Air - React Native FastIO: Nitro-Powered Performance Boost](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u4PBBLujv7I)

- 📦 [Drag Select 0.1 \- Utility for creating a pan gesture that auto-selects items in a list](https://github.com/osamaqarem/drag-select)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [演示集锦 - 90+个基于Reanimated、Gesture Handler和Skia打造的React Native动画，由Reactiive提供](https://reactiive.io/demos?utm_source=thisweekinreact)
- 📊 [2024年React Native现状调查 - 问卷开放中，快来参与！](https://survey.stateofreactnative.com/)
- 🐦 [Evan Bacon的`npx create-target demo`](https://x.com/Baconbrix/status/1868672438898455023)：全新CLI工具，可创建与Expo应用共存的iOS目标组件（如小组件、分享扩展），并通过共享存储实现通信。
- 🧵 [Infinite Red - 2024年最佳React Native文章精选](https://x.com/infinite_red/status/1869104889777020951)
- 📣 [Android XR SDK开发者预览版发布](https://developers.googleblog.com/en/introducing-android-xr-sdk-developer-preview/)：谷歌推出面向扩展现实头显的新Android平台。正如Oskar所承诺，React Native支持即将到来（[演示](https://x.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1868645896239690009)）
- 📣 [Expo - 苹果推送通知服务证书变更预告](https://expo.dev/blog/upcoming-apple-push-notification-service-certificate-change)：Expo推送服务用户无需任何操作。
- 📜 [将React Native集成至Signal开源应用](https://blog.swmansion.com/add-react-native-to-the-signal-open-source-app-part-2-android-803c1b726582)：两篇系列教程（iOS+Android）演示如何在现有应用中集成React Native。
- 📜 [如何在遗留应用中升级React Native](https://www.callstack.com/blog/how-to-upgrade-react-native-in-a-brownfield-application)
- 📜 [Marathon如何通过Expo实现社交分享功能](https://expo.dev/blog/how-we-promote-social-sharing-on-marathon-with-expo)
- 📜 [在Expo Router中构建无缝导航：标签页、模态框与堆栈](https://medium.com/@coby09/building-seamless-navigation-in-expo-router-tabs-modals-and-stacks-2df1a5522321)
- 📦 [React Native图像游乐场](https://github.com/Ucekay/react-native-image-playground)：集成iOS 18.2+苹果智能图像生成功能至您的应用。
- 📦 [Nitro 0.19 - Swift错误处理、双向Promise、类型擦除](https://github.com/mrousavy/nitro/releases/tag/v0.19.0)
- 📦 [Nitro Palette 1.0 - 快速从图像提取色彩方案](https://github.com/Ucekay/nitro-palette/releases/tag/v1.0.0)
- 📦 [React Native音量管理器2.0 - 支持新架构、RN 0.76+、iOS 15+、Expo 52+](https://github.com/hirbod/react-native-volume-manager/releases/tag/v2.0.1)
- 📦 [拖拽选择器0.1 - 自动选中列表项的滑动手势工具](https://github.com/osamaqarem/drag-select)
- 📦 [React Native测试库13.0候选版 - 默认启用并发渲染，自动扩展Jest匹配器](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-testing-library/releases/tag/v13.0.0-rc.0)
- 🎥 [Dan实验室 - 用线性代数和React Native Skia实现基础3D图形](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uZBGcbKFhXE)
- 🎥 [Expo全栈Stripe支付集成方案](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0tyxUV_omY)
- 🎙️ [火箭飞船56期 - Bluesky的React Native应用与AT协议解析](https://share.transistor.fm/s/2134db4c)
- 🎙️ [React宇宙电台 - Nitro驱动的React Native性能优化](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u4PBBLujv7I)
